name: The ultimate Form
description:
Your friend have been kidnapped by a bad guy. In order to save her, you are going to your old friends to ask for help.

Controls:

W - jump and shoot(can shoot only in the form)

A,D - Left and right

Space - "Move to next dialog"

F - to change form

follow me on insta ^-^ : https://www.instagram.com/dark_angel_60/

This game is made for the brackeys jam. And also there is no sound or music for now
